channel.title: Posts on Houlton McGuinn
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Houlton McGuinn

item.title: Backyard Hydrogen Line Astronomy
item.description: I’ve been interested in astronomy and space since I was a kid, but never really did much with it. During my internship at Georgia Tech Research Institute, I learned to use a software-defined radio to investigate vulnerabilities in an IOT camera’s over-the-air communication protocol. Reading this post on using a SDR to detect pulsars inspired me. What else could you detect with one? Being interested in both astronomy and SDR’s, this project naturally followed.
